format: TypeScript (TSX for React with Remix framework)
description: This file defines the frontend component and server-related handlers for creating a new note in a Remix-based React application. It includes loader and action functions for data fetching and form submission, as well as the React component for rendering the note creation form.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Checks user authentication status based on the request; redirects to login if unauthenticated, otherwise returns a success JSON.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submissions for creating a new note; processes form data, calls backend API, and manages navigation or errors.
